item.description:
Every 2nd and 4th Tuesday nights of every month, 7 p.m., we have reserved a room at
Nashua Public Library for our Help2LearnChinese Meetup.

So, mark your calendar and come on Aug. 28, Tuesday night ! Ask the librarian which
conference room, usually the Hunt Conference Room.

The GOAL is to make practicing Chinese conversation a ROUTINE, at least twice a month!

All levels welcome! no one will be left out, even you don't speak Chinese Mandarin yet ;)

Try it you'll like it ! Love to see you all !!

Best Regards,
Edwin E Ouyang

p.s. just arrived and came back from China few hours ago, was there for 2 months !
item.name: 4th Tuesday Regular Meetup ;)
